contentList.content: You gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>, damage taken from all sources is reduced by [2] and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Additionally, if you have less than [3] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> at the start of your turn in combat you regain [3] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
